questions.question: Which National Health Sector Strategic Plan defined the new approach using KEPH?
questions.explanation: NHSSP II (2005–2010) introduced the Kenya Essential Package for Health (KEPH) and community involvement approaches.

questions.question: Match the Age Cohort to its correct definition:

pairs.right: Pregnancy and the newborn (up to 28 days)

questions.question: Under the revised KEPH structure, Level 2 (Dispensaries) and Level 3 (Health Centers) were combined into Tier 2: Primary Care Level.
questions.explanation: True. To align with the county system, Dispensaries and Health Centres were combined into the Primary Care Level (Tier 2).

questions.question: Select the key pillars (elements) of KEPH from the list below:
questions.explanation: The pillars are Equity, Access, Effectiveness, Efficiency, and Partnerships.
